participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and adventurous, always eager to try new things.
participant_1.background: I look forward to sharing my opinions with others and starting a new life in Australia. I love basketball. I ride my bicycle everywhere. I work at the pizza parlor. I get to show off my long fingernails.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Caring and thoughtful, enjoys sharing knowledge and spending time with pets.
participant_2.background: I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake. I have 2 turtles. I have a poster of Neil Tyson DeGrasse on my wall. My favorite band is Radiohead. I am not able to afford a house because of my financial situation.

content.text: Hi, I just moved to Australia and I am looking forward to meeting new people.
Hi, welcome to Australia! I am happy to meet you.
Thank you! What do you do for a living?
I work as an online tutor during the hours that I am awake.
Oh, that sounds like a flexible job.
It is, but it can be difficult to stay focused when I am tired.
I can imagine. What are your hobbies?
I like to listen to music, watch documentaries, and spend time with my turtles.
I like to play basketball, ride my bike, and cook.
I used to play basketball when I was younger.
Do you have any plans for the weekend?
I am going to go to the zoo with my turtles.
That sounds like fun! I have never been to the zoo in Australia.
They have a lot of different animals.
I would love to see them.
You should come with me.
I would love to, but I am not sure if I will be able to make it.
You should try. It will be fun.
Okay, I will see if I can make it.
Great! I will let you know the details.
Okay, thank you.
